title: JACCS, Visa and Citibank Japan to Collaborate in the Prepaid Card Business
summary: Tokyo - JACCS Co., Ltd. (Shibuya-ku, Tokyo; President, CEO,COO and Representative Director: Yasuyoshi Itagaki; "JACCS") Visa Worldwide (Japan) Co., Ltd. (Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director; Kazuhiko Okamoto; "Visa"), and Citibank Japan Ltd. (Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director, President and CEO: Kazuya Jono; "Citibank") will jointly offer the first multi-currency prepaid card in Japan starting on July 1, 2013.
tag-1: JACCS, Visa and Citibank Japan to Collaborate in the Prepaid Card Business
tag-3: Tokyo – JACCS Co., Ltd. (Shibuya-ku, Tokyo; President, CEO,COO and Representative Director: Yasuyoshi Itagaki; "JACCS") Visa Worldwide (Japan) Co., Ltd. (Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director; Kazuhiko Okamoto; "Visa"), and Citibank Japan Ltd. (Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo; Representative Director, President and CEO: Kazuya Jono; "Citibank") will jointly offer the first multi-currency prepaid card in Japan starting on July 1, 2013.
tag-4: This prepaid card will be issued by JACCS, with a multi-currency function on a Visa travel prepaid card1 for exclusive use by Citibank customers who have a Multi-Money Account2 and a Yen Savings Account. This is the first prepaid card with a multi-currency function to be made available in Japan.
tag-5: This prepaid card has a multi-currency function that allows the cardholder to charge four foreign currencies (U.S. dollar, Euro, British pound, and Australian dollar) in addition to Japanese yen onto one card. Customers who have foreign currency in their Citibank Multi-Money Account can charge the prepaid card with foreign currency transferred directly from the account3.
tag-6: Leveraging the international network of Visa, a cardholder can withdraw cash at any of the approximately at any of the 2.0 million ATMs with the Visa and/or PLUS logo mark around the world, in the foreign currency with which the cardholder charged the prepaid card.
tag-7: A service that allows customers to directly use foreign currencies deposited in their bank account is rare, and the ways to utilize foreign currencies has been limited for those residing in Japan. This prepaid card allows the cardholder to use foreign currencies in their bank account directly without incurring the cost of converting the currency to yen or being affected by exchange rate risk. With this prepaid card, it is also possible to minimize the risk of overuse, loss, theft, forgery, etc., as the use of the card is limited to the amount of cash with which the cardholder charged the card. This prepaid card is a product that will provide customers with new value both from the perspective of convenience and safety, which has not been available until now.
tag-8: JACCS will use Gonna as a brand name to cover its entire prepaid card business going forward, and will provide a wide variety of prepaid card services through cooperation with Visa.
tag-9: 1 A prepaid card offered by Visa for overseas use only. A cardholder can withdraw cash in the local currency at ATMs located in more than 200 countries overseas. As the use of the card is limited to the amount of cash with which the cardholder loaded the card, you need not worry about overusage.
tag-10: 2 The Multi-Money Account is a deposit account offered by Citibank Japan.
tag-11: 3 Customers who have deposited cash in their yen savings account can charge the prepaid card with cash in yen transferred directly from their deposit.
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
